channel.title: CVE Feed for MagePeople Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MagePeople Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43985|2024-09-18T13:56:16.232Z -- magepeople%20team -- bus%20ticket%20booking%20with%20seat%20reservation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Bus Ticket Booking with Seat Reservation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bus Ticket Booking with Seat Reservation: from n/a through 5.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-43986|2024-08-29T13:02:18.088Z -- magepeople%20team -- taxi%20booking%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Taxi Booking Manager for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Taxi Booking Manager for WooCommerce: through 1.0.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-43138|2024-08-13T13:35:49.117Z -- magepeople%20team -- event%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Event Manager for WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Event Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.2.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-32450|2024-08-02T02:06:44.235Z -- magepeople%20team -- wptravelly
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in MagePeople Team WpTravelly.This issue affects WpTravelly: from n/a through 1.6.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32450|2024-06-04T17:50:05.687Z -- magepeople%20team -- wptravelly
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in MagePeople Team WpTravelly.This issue affects WpTravelly: from n/a through 1.6.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-43138|2024-08-13T11:35:20.843Z -- magepeople%20team -- event%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Event Manager for WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Event Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.2.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-43986|2024-08-29T09:02:32.510Z -- magepeople%20team -- taxi%20booking%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Taxi Booking Manager for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Taxi Booking Manager for WooCommerce: through 1.0.9.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MagePeople Team Bus Ticket Booking with Seat Reservation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bus Ticket Booking with Seat Reservation: from n/a through 5.3.5.
